comments.body:
per our chat on irc, this sounds like gollum "metricses"...

are we stuck with this name forever if its in v1alpha1 clients already?

it would be good if we can get a fix post feature freeze to have it sound like sensible english.
I'll post a follow up PR -- it needs changes to gengo to detect already-plural type names and not attempt to pluralize them.
I'm ok with a fix going in post code freeze
